name: Bewitching Brewery
description:
Welcome to Bewitching Brewery! 

Hurry and open up your shop! 
Potions, Poisons, Elixirs, Ointments .. you got them all! 
The line outside is also getting pretty long .. looks like your customers are eagerly waiting for you to brew them some of your magical concoctions!

What is Bewitching Brewery?

Bewitching Brewery is a 2D puzzle point&click game, in which you, the witch, must combine ingredients to brew potions for the orders of your customers. 


Choose one of many orders and create the perfect potion!

Help your clients in every life situation they may go through. Getting orders right, will make you a wiser witch, which lets you brew more advanced potions for your demanding customers.

Undecisive? Mix as many ingredients together as you want!

Some potions are easy to make and do not neccessarily require more than one or two ingredients. More advanced potions may need a combination of three to five ingredients, so be prepared for a lot of mixing! 

Unlock over 15 different potions (including some easter eggs)

The more combinations you try, the more likely you are to learn new potions and unlock them in your recipe book. (Hint: There are 3 easter eggs hidden in the game, that no customer asks of you. Can you find them all?)

Controls
  • left mouse button - interact with everything
  • click book to see your recipe book, order list, options and credits
  • click ladle to finish brewing your potion and delivering your order
  • left/right arrow - turn page in the spellbook
Still a WIP 

For now you can't close the standalone game via ingame options, please use Alt + F4 or the task manager.
